title: 台北/閃銀有限公司/2020 Operations Assistant實習生
content:
【公司名稱／工作職缺】
閃銀有限公司Quiksilver&Roxy / 營運部助理工讀生

【工作內容】

• Maintain POS and control IBTs
• Assist with performing weekly spot stocktakes and quarterly stocktakes
• Routinely monitor in-store cameras
• Reconcile daily sales with POS record and have store amend if necessary
• Monitor POS individual sales records for irregularities
• Routinely monitor VIP system and randomly call VIPs for feedback on a weekly basis
• Collect and collate sales data for weekly, monthly and quarterly sales reports
• Source and purchase store hardware, fittings and services
• Process monthly commission, bonus and penalty information for monthly payroll
• Service and process wholesale business including sending weekly stock list
• Assist in monitoring stores including POP and cleanliness
• Report to Operations Manager
• Attendance Report and management for stores

【工作地點】
台北市信義區信義路五段150巷2號21樓2100室

【工作時間】
工作時間為2020.1~2020.6.30(過年休息)
上班日一到五 0930~1830 中間休息1小時 週休二日


【徵求條件】
此職缺需要製作出勤、月 週報表
因此須了解文書作業 例如:EXCEL.OUTLOOK
樂於溝通
活潑開朗

【加分條件】
英文語言溝通能力

【薪資待遇】
$158/H

【公司福利】
春酒活動

【聯絡方式】
HR/tyler.sun@boardriders.com

【其他備註】
代PO，如需投遞請直接寄信至上述EMAIL
